data_quality_feedback.issue: Total emissions (12000.0) does not match sum of scopes (9500.0)
data_quality_feedback.recommendation: Verify calculation methodology. Total should equal Scope 1 + Scope 2 (location-based) + Scope 3.
data_quality_feedback.compliance_impact: May trigger auditor questions during limited assurance

data_quality_feedback.issue: Scope 3 represents only 37.5% of total emissions
data_quality_feedback.recommendation: Scope 3 typically represents 70-90% of total emissions. Review calculation methodology, especially Categories 1, 3, 4, and 11. Consider using GHG Protocol Scope 3 Evaluator tool.
CSRD requires extensive narrative disclosures. Prepare descriptions for: transition plans, governance, strategy integration, stakeholder engagement, and double materiality assessment process.
data_quality_feedback.compliance_impact: Missing mandatory narrative disclosures under ESRS

data_quality_feedback.issue: Emissions value appears to be rounded to nearest thousand
data_quality_feedback.recommendation: Consider reporting with appropriate precision (1-2 decimal places) to demonstrate calculation rigor.
data_quality_feedback.compliance_impact: May raise questions about data quality during assurance

data_quality_feedback.recommendation: High discharge rate may indicate opportunities for water recycling. Consider closed-loop systems or treatment for reuse.
data_quality_feedback.compliance_impact: May indicate incomplete water efficiency measures
